title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Developing Pre-Reading Skills in Early Childhood through Embodied Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic child development theories and understanding of reading education methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Design three or more pre-reading skill enhancement activities for young children by applying embodied learning principles.
Develop customized activity modules for a group of young children with varying reading proficiency levels
Achieve over 80% effectiveness of activities through formative assessments during the 6-week project period

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
